data.text: Ife tamva ndi makutu athu, Inu Mulungu;
Ndi dzanja lanu munathamangitsa mitundu ya anthu ena
Sanalande dziko ndi lupanga lawo,
Inu ndinu Mfumu yanga ndi Mulungu wanga
Kudzera kwa inu ife timabweza adani athu;
Sindidalira uta wanga,
koma Inu mumatigonjetsera adani athu,
Timanyadira mwa Mulungu wathu tsiku lonse,
Koma tsopano mwatikana ndi kutichepetsa;
Munachititsa ife kubwerera m始mbuyo pamaso pa mdani
Inu munatipereka kuti tiwonongedwe monga nkhosa
Inu munagulitsa anthu anu pa mtengo wotsika,
Mwachititsa kuti tikhale chochititsa manyazi kwa anthu a mitundu ina,
Mwachititsa kuti tikhale onyozeka pakati pa anthu a mitundu ina;
Manyazi anga ali pamaso panga tsiku lonse
chifukwa cha mawu otonza a iwo amene amandinyoza ndi kundichita chipongwe,
Zonsezi zinatichitikira
Mitima yathu sinabwerere m始mbuyo;
Koma Inu mwatiphwanya ndi kuchititsa kuti tikhale ozunzidwa ndi ankhandwe
Tikanayiwala dzina la Mulungu wathu
kodi Mulungu wathu sakanazidziwa zimenezi,
Komabe chifukwa cha Inu timakumana ndi imfa tsiku lonse,
Dzukani Ambuye! N始chifukwa chiyani mukugona!
N始chifukwa chiyani mukubisa nkhope yanu,
Tatsitsidwa pansi mpaka pa fumbi;
Imirirani ndi kutithandiza,
